messages.subject: Re: [nihontostudy] Re: Sword Surrender Photo....
messages.msgSnippet: Interesting photo, Gary. Have copied it for my file. I still try to keep copies of any photos showing swords being found, surrendered, whatever. Neat history
messages.messageBody:
Interesting photo, Gary. Have copied it for my file. I still try to keep copies of any photos showing swords being found, surrendered, whatever. Neat history stuff!

Ron
STL

----- Original Message -----
From: Gary Gabelhouse
To: nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Friday, July 24, 2009 11:40 AM
Subject: [nihontostudy] Re: Sword Surrender Photo....


Hello All,

When doing research on an old UDT friend of mine who had died, I came across this photo. I thought some of you may find it interesting.

www.gabelhouse.com/WWII-1st-Sword-Surrender.htm

Take Care,
Gary Gabelhouse
